title: iShares S&P 500 Index (IVV) Showing Bearish Technicals With Resistance At $197.72
content:
Sponsor 

Sep 23, 2015 (Marketintelligencecenter.com via COMTEX) -- 

A covered call identified by MarketIntelligececenter.com's patented algorithm on iShares S&P 500 Index ( IVV ) could yield about 2.73% (17.18% annualized, for comparison purposes only) in 58 days. Pair a long position in the ETF with a sold Nov. '15 $196.00 call for a net debit of about $190.79. This position also has 2.70% downside protection. IVV closed at $196.09 Tuesday. Technical indicators for IVV are bearish and support and resistance have been about $193.92 and $197.72, respectively.
